skillDefinitions.name: Insight
skillDefinitions.description: Ability to hindsight in real time

skillDefinitions.name: Athletics
skillDefinitions.description: Ability to do athletic stuff, idk

skillDefinitions.name: Deception
skillDefinitions.description: Ability to more than meets the eye

skillDefinitions.name: Acrobatics
skillDefinitions.description: Ability to like flip and stuff

backgroundDefinitions.name: Wayfarer
backgroundDefinitions.description: You are a seasoned traveler who has crossed strange lands, survived in the wilderness, and adapted to the hardships of life on the road.

characterClassDefinitions.name: Vanguard
characterClassDefinitions.description: A disciplined warrior who leads from the front, anchoring the line and shielding allies from harm.

characterClassDefinitions.name: Arcanist
characterClassDefinitions.description: A scholar of the unknown who studies the nature of magic itself, bending it to their will through intellect and willpower rather than instinct.

effects.title: Aetheric Surge
effects.description: Once per rest, reroll a spell attack or damage roll and take the higher result.

effects.title: Ignore Cover
effects.description: Your ranged attacks ignore up to three-quarters cover.

effects.title: Power Shot
effects.description: Before making a ranged attack, you can choose to take a -5 penalty to the roll. If it hits, add +10 damage.

effects.title: Hardened Flesh
effects.description: Reduce incoming physical damage by 1 while not wearing heavy armor.

effects.title: Long Range Accuracy
effects.description: You suffer no disadvantage on ranged attacks made at long range.

effects.title: Insightful Reasoning
effects.description: Gain a bonus to Insight checks as your study of people and ideas sharpens your perception.

effects.title: Molten Empowerment
effects.description: When reduced below half health, gain +2 Strength until the end of your next turn.

effects.title: Stone Skin
effects.description: Gain resistance to bludgeoning damage from nonmagical sources.

effects.title: Resist Fatigue
effects.description: Gain advantage on saving throws against exhaustion or effects that cause fatigue.

effects.title: Contemplative Rest
effects.description: When taking a short or long rest, you can spend 10 minutes in meditation to grant one ally advantage on their next saving throw within the next hour.

effects.title: Efficient Casting
effects.description: Once per long rest, you may reduce the cost of one spell or ability by 1 point (mana, focus, or equivalent).

effects.title: Radiant Pulse
effects.description: Emit a burst of radiant light that heals allies or burns enemies within 10 feet.

effects.title: Earthen Focus
effects.description: You have advantage on Constitution saving throws made to resist exhaustion.

effects.title: Persuasive Speaker
effects.description: Gain a bonus to Persuasion checks from your ability to frame arguments logically.

effects.title: Flat Bonus
effects.description: Your maximum hit points increase by 2 for each level you have.

effects.title: Survival Expertise
effects.description: Gain a bonus to Survival checks when foraging for food or navigating difficult terrain.

effects.title: Shadow Veil
effects.description: Gain advantage on Stealth checks for 1 minute and resistance to radiant damage.

effects.title: Prepared Mind
effects.description: Gain a +1 bonus to initiative rolls.

effects.title: Stop the Advance
effects.description: When an enemy moves within 5 feet of you, you may use your reaction to reduce their movement speed by half until the end of their turn.

effects.title: Sense Magic
effects.description: You automatically detect the presence of active magical effects within 15 feet.

effects.title: Enduring Fortitude
effects.description: Increase your maximum hit points by 1 per character level.

effects.title: Resist Exhaustion
effects.description: You gain advantage on saving throws made to resist exhaustion from travel, hunger, or harsh environments.

effects.title: Guardian’s Resolve
effects.description: Gain a +1 bonus to AC while you are within 5 feet of at least one ally.

effects.title: Disciplined Focus
effects.description: Gain advantage on concentration checks to maintain magical effects.

featDefinitions.name: Essence Overflow
featDefinitions.description: Your unstable form leaks raw magic, allowing you to enhance your spells or abilities in unpredictable but powerful ways.

featDefinitions.name: Focus Channel
featDefinitions.description: You maintain precision over your power through intense concentration.

featDefinitions.name: Hold the Line
featDefinitions.description: You excel at halting enemy advances and protecting allies who fight beside you.

featDefinitions.name: Unyielding Form
featDefinitions.description: When focused, your body becomes nearly impervious, resisting damage with supernatural toughness.

featDefinitions.name: Sharpshooter
featDefinitions.description: You excel at ranged weapon attacks, ignoring cover and striking with deadly precision.

featDefinitions.name: Tough
featDefinitions.description: You are unusually hardy, gaining additional health to endure hardships.

featDefinitions.name: Arcane Instinct
featDefinitions.description: Your intuition allows you to sense fluctuations in magical energy before others can perceive them.

featDefinitions.name: Philosopher's Insight
featDefinitions.description: Your contemplative nature and sharp reasoning grant you clarity in thought and speech.

featDefinitions.name: Radiant Pulse
featDefinitions.description: You can channel your inner light into a burst of healing or searing brilliance.

featDefinitions.name: Traveler's Resilience
featDefinitions.description: Years of wandering have hardened you against fatigue and sharpened your survival instincts.

featDefinitions.name: Veil of Dusk
featDefinitions.description: You shroud yourself in shadow, becoming harder to detect and briefly resistant to harm.

featDefinitions.name: Enduring Resilience
featDefinitions.description: The Stoneborn’s connection to the earth grants them incredible fortitude in the face of harm.

featDefinitions.name: Iron Stamina
featDefinitions.description: Your training has made you tireless and steadfast, shrugging off fatigue and pain.

featDefinitions.name: Molten Surge
featDefinitions.description: Your veins thrum with latent volcanic energy that erupts in moments of desperation, amplifying your physical might temporarily.

itemDefinitionBases.name: Reinforced Chain Vest
itemDefinitionBases.description: Interlinked steel rings layered over padded leather. Reliable protection without excessive weight.

itemDefinitionBases.name: Scholar's Robe
itemDefinitionBases.description: Simple robe with many pockets for notes and scrolls.

itemDefinitionBases.name: Iron Buckler
itemDefinitionBases.description: A small round shield that can be strapped to the forearm, freeing the hand when needed.

itemDefinitionBases.name: Worn Leather Jerkin
itemDefinitionBases.description: Provides basic protection while remaining light and flexible for travel.

itemDefinitionBases.name: Threaded Aetherweave Robe
itemDefinitionBases.description: Silken robe reinforced with faintly luminescent thread. Offers minimal protection but aids focus.

itemDefinitionBases.name: Flint and Tinder
itemDefinitionBases.description: Essential for starting fires in the wilderness.

itemDefinitionBases.name: Quill of Insight
itemDefinitionBases.description: A fine quill said to help one focus thoughts when writing or studying.

itemDefinitionBases.name: Notebook of Endless Thoughts
itemDefinitionBases.description: Leather-bound notebook filled with blank pages for jotting down ideas.

itemDefinitionBases.name: Traveler's Satchel
itemDefinitionBases.description: Holds rations, maps, and other essentials for long journeys.

itemDefinitionBases.name: Researcher's Satchel
itemDefinitionBases.description: Contains ink, quills, parchment, and a few notes on magical formulae.

itemDefinitionBases.name: Steel Longsword
itemDefinitionBases.description: A well-balanced blade favored by disciplined soldiers.

itemDefinitionBases.name: Arcane Focus Staff
itemDefinitionBases.description: A polished wooden staff carved with runes, used both as walking aid and conduit for magic.

itemDefinitionBases.name: Wooden Walking Staff
itemDefinitionBases.description: A plain staff used for walking or defending oneself if needed.

itemDefinitionBases.name: Traveler's Short Sword
itemDefinitionBases.description: A versatile weapon, useful for both defense and small game hunting.

speciesDefinitions.name: Aetherborn
speciesDefinitions.description: Aetherborn are ephemeral beings formed of condensed magical energy and fading memories. Their forms shimmer with faint light, and their voices carry an otherworldly resonance.

lineageDefinitions.name: Umbral
lineageDefinitions.description: The Umbral are born from fading energy and shadow, embodying entropy and silence.

lineageDefinitions.name: Luminar
lineageDefinitions.description: Luminar Aetherborn radiate light and warmth, their essence stable and benevolent.

speciesDefinitions.name: Stoneborn
speciesDefinitions.description: Forged by the slow patience of the mountains, Stoneborn are sturdy beings with skin like granite and hearts that beat in rhythm with the earth itself. They value endurance, tradition, and the slow but unstoppable progress of time.

lineageDefinitions.name: Granitekin
lineageDefinitions.description: Pale, dense, and seemingly immovable, Granitekin are known for withstanding punishment that would crumble lesser beings.

lineageDefinitions.name: Basaltblood
lineageDefinitions.description: Basaltbloods are darker-skinned Stoneborn who channel their inner pressure into explosive bursts of might when under duress.
